 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "aging-chassis",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# Keras: Classify Multi-Label"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "contained-knock",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "![iris](../images/iris.png)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "drawn-fortune",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Reference this great blog for machine learning cookbooks: [MachineLearningMastery.com \"Multi-Label Classification\"](https://machinelearningmastery.com/multi-label-classification-with-deep-learning/)."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "id": "changed-cheese",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import keras\n",
    "from keras.models import Sequential\n",
    "from keras.layers import Dense, Dropout\n",
    "from keras.callbacks import History\n",
    "\n",
    "from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, PowerTransformer\n",
    "\n",
    "import aiqc\n",
    "from aiqc import datum"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "disabled-squad",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "---"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "funky-composite",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Example Data"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "weird-marathon",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Reference [Example Datasets](example_datasets.ipynb) for more information."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "id": "silver-tradition",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "df = datum.to_pandas('iris.tsv')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "id": "nonprofit-blackberry",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>sepal_length</th>\n",
       "      <th>sepal_width</th>\n",
       "      <th>petal_length</th>\n",
       "      <th>petal_width</th>\n",
       "      <th>species</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>0</th>\n",
       "      <td>5.1</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.5</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.4</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.2</td>\n",
       "      <td>setosa</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>1</th>\n",
       "      <td>4.9</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.0</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.4</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.2</td>\n",
       "      <td>setosa</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2</th>\n",
       "      <td>4.7</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.2</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.3</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.2</td>\n",
       "      <td>setosa</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>3</th>\n",
       "      <td>4.6</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.1</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.5</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.2</td>\n",
       "      <td>setosa</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>4</th>\n",
       "      <td>5.0</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.6</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.4</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.2</td>\n",
       "      <td>setosa</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "   sepal_length  sepal_width  petal_length  petal_width species\n",
       "0           5.1          3.5           1.4          0.2  setosa\n",
       "1           4.9          3.0           1.4          0.2  setosa\n",
       "2           4.7          3.2           1.3          0.2  setosa\n",
       "3           4.6          3.1           1.5          0.2  setosa\n",
       "4           5.0          3.6           1.4          0.2  setosa"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 4,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "df.head()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "id": "defensive-university",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "sepal_length    float64\n",
       "sepal_width     float64\n",
       "petal_length    float64\n",
       "petal_width     float64\n",
       "species          object\n",
       "dtype: object"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 5,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "df.dtypes"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "photographic-mortality",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "---"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "abstract-hepatitis",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## a) High-Level API"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "appropriate-gambling",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Reference [High-Level API Docs](api_high_level.ipynb) for more information including how to work with non-tabular data."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "id": "violent-offer",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "\n",
      "___/ featurecoder_index: 0 \\_________\n",
      "\n",
      "=> The column(s) below matched your filter(s) and were ran through a test-encoding successfully.\n",
      "\n",
      "['sepal_length', 'sepal_width', 'petal_length', 'petal_width']\n",
      "\n",
      "=> Done. All feature column(s) have encoder(s) associated with them.\n",
      "No more Featurecoders can be added to this Encoderset.\n",
      "\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "splitset = aiqc.Pipeline.Tabular.make(\n",
    "    dataFrame_or_filePath = df\n",
    "    , label_column = 'species'\n",
    "    , size_test = 0.22\n",
    "    , size_validation = 0.12\n",
    "    , label_encoder = OneHotEncoder(sparse=False)\n",
    "    , feature_encoders = [{\n",
    "        \"sklearn_preprocess\": PowerTransformer(method='box-cox', copy=False)\n",
    "        , \"dtypes\": ['float64']\n",
    "    }]\n",
    "    \n",
    "    , dtype = None\n",
    "    , features_excluded = None\n",
    "    , fold_count = None\n",
    "    , bin_count = None\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "id": "black-potter",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def fn_build(features_shape, label_shape, **hp):\n",
    "    model = Sequential()\n",
    "    model.add(Dense(units=features_shape[0], activation='relu', kernel_initializer='he_uniform'))\n",
    "    model.add(Dropout(0.2))\n",
    "    model.add(Dense(units=hp['neuron_count'], activation='relu', kernel_initializer='he_uniform'))\n",
    "    model.add(Dense(units=label_shape[0], activation='softmax'))\n",
    "    return model"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "id": "spoken-august",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def fn_train(model, loser, optimizer, samples_train, samples_evaluate, **hp):\n",
    "    model.compile(\n",
    "        loss = loser\n",
    "        , optimizer = optimizer\n",
    "        , metrics = ['accuracy']\n",
    "    )\n",
    "    model.fit(\n",
    "        samples_train[\"features\"]\n",
    "        , samples_train[\"labels\"]\n",
    "        , validation_data = (\n",
    "            samples_evaluate[\"features\"]\n",
    "            , samples_evaluate[\"labels\"]\n",
    "        )\n",
    "        , verbose = 0\n",
    "        , batch_size = hp['batch_size']\n",
    "        , epochs = hp['epoch_count']\n",
    "        , callbacks=[History()]\n",
    "    )\n",
    "    return model"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 9,
   "id": "pleased-feeding",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "hyperparameters = {\n",
    "    \"neuron_count\": [9, 12]\n",
    "    , \"batch_size\": [3]\n",
    "    , \"learning_rate\": [0.03, 0.05]\n",
    "    , \"epoch_count\": [30, 60]\n",
    "}"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "id": "accepted-bolivia",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "queue = aiqc.Experiment.make(\n",
    "    library = \"keras\"\n",
    "    , analysis_type = \"classification_multi\"\n",
    "    , fn_build = fn_build\n",
    "    , fn_train = fn_train\n",
    "    , splitset_id = splitset.id\n",
    "    , repeat_count = 1\n",
    "    , hide_test = False\n",
    "    , hyperparameters = hyperparameters\n",
    "    \n",
    "    , fn_lose = None #automated\n",
    "    , fn_optimize = None #automated\n",
    "    , fn_predict = None #automated\n",
    "    , foldset_id = None\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 11,
   "id": "soviet-resident",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stderr",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "ðŸ”® Training Models ðŸ”®: 100%|â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ| 8/8 [00:37<00:00,  4.68s/it]\n"

    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "queue.run_jobs()"
   ]

   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "asian-intention",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "---"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "intensive-relationship",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## b) Low-Level API"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "fitted-assault",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Reference [Low-Level API Docs](api_high_level.ipynb) for more information including how to work with non-tabular data, and defining an optimizer."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "id": "continent-mechanics",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "dataset = aiqc.Dataset.Tabular.from_pandas(df)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 13,
   "id": "german-thing",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "label_column = 'species'"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 14,
   "id": "considerable-workplace",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "label = dataset.make_label(columns=[label_column])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 15,
   "id": "underlying-suicide",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "labelcoder = label.make_labelcoder(\n",
    "    sklearn_preprocess = OneHotEncoder(sparse=False)\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 16,
   "id": "hispanic-filling",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "feature = dataset.make_feature(exclude_columns=[label_column])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 17,
   "id": "collaborative-collectible",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "encoderset = feature.make_encoderset()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 18,
   "id": "logical-statistics",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "\n",
      "___/ featurecoder_index: 0 \\_________\n",
      "\n",
      "=> The column(s) below matched your filter(s) and were ran through a test-encoding successfully.\n",
      "\n",
      "['sepal_length', 'sepal_width', 'petal_length', 'petal_width']\n",
      "\n",
      "=> Done. All feature column(s) have encoder(s) associated with them.\n",
      "No more Featurecoders can be added to this Encoderset.\n",
      "\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "featurecoder_0 = encoderset.make_featurecoder(\n",
    "    sklearn_preprocess = PowerTransformer(method='yeo-johnson', copy=False)\n",
    "    , dtypes = ['float64']\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 19,
   "id": "featured-binding",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "splitset = aiqc.Splitset.make(\n",
    "    feature_ids = [feature.id]\n",
    "    , label_id = label.id\n",
    "    , size_test = 0.22\n",
    "    , size_validation = 0.12\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 20,
   "id": "fuzzy-garden",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def fn_build(features_shape, label_shape, **hp):\n",
    "    model = Sequential()\n",
    "    model.add(Dense(units=features_shape[0], activation='relu', kernel_initializer='he_uniform'))\n",
    "    model.add(Dropout(0.2))\n",
    "    model.add(Dense(units=hp['neuron_count'], activation='relu', kernel_initializer='he_uniform'))\n",
    "    model.add(Dense(units=label_shape[0], activation='softmax'))\n",
    "    return model"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "still-bruce",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Optional, just included to show users how to specify their own optimizer."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 21,
   "id": "integral-height",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def fn_optimize(**hp):\n",
    "    optimizer = keras.optimizers.Adamax()\n",
    "    return optimizer"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 22,
   "id": "simplified-egypt",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def fn_train(model, loser, optimizer, samples_train, samples_evaluate, **hp):\n",
    "    model.compile(\n",
    "        loss = loser\n",
    "        , optimizer = optimizer\n",
    "        , metrics = ['accuracy']\n",
    "    )\n",
    "    model.fit(\n",
    "        samples_train[\"features\"]\n",
    "        , samples_train[\"labels\"]\n",
    "        , validation_data = (\n",
    "            samples_evaluate[\"features\"]\n",
    "            , samples_evaluate[\"labels\"]\n",
    "        )\n",
    "        , verbose = 0\n",
    "        , batch_size = hp['batch_size']\n",
    "        , epochs = hp['epoch_count']\n",
    "        , callbacks=[History()]\n",
    "    )\n",
    "    return model"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 23,
   "id": "greater-comedy",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "algorithm = aiqc.Algorithm.make(\n",
    "    library = \"keras\"\n",
    "    , analysis_type = \"classification_multi\"\n",
    "    , fn_build = fn_build\n",
    "    , fn_train = fn_train\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 24,
   "id": "compliant-comedy",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "hyperparameters = {\n",
    "    \"neuron_count\": [9, 12]\n",
    "    , \"batch_size\": [3]\n",
    "    , \"learning_rate\": [0.03, 0.05]\n",
    "    , \"epoch_count\": [30, 60]\n",
    "}"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 25,
   "id": "medical-constitutional",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "hyperparamset = algorithm.make_hyperparamset(\n",
    "    hyperparameters = hyperparameters\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 26,
   "id": "dying-listening",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "queue = algorithm.make_queue(\n",
    "    splitset_id = splitset.id\n",
    "    , hyperparamset_id = hyperparamset.id\n",
    "    , repeat_count = 1\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 27,
   "id": "infinite-intranet",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stderr",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "ðŸ”® Training Models ðŸ”®: 100%|â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ| 8/8 [00:35<00:00,  4.49s/it]\n"
